parameter.name: $page
parameter.description: Page number to return from the paged results.

parameter.name: $pageSize
parameter.description: Number of items to return on a page of results. The default and maximum value is 50.

parameter.name: $orderBy
parameter.description: Determines which asset property to use for sorting, and also determines the direction in which to sort the data.

parameter.name: definitionType
parameter.description: The type of definition to retrieve. The only accepted value is 'transactional'.

parameter.name: extras
parameter.description: Additional information to include in the response. Possible values: activities, outcome, stats, all. 'All' provides all available extra details but may impact query performance.

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: The external key of a journey to retrieve.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The ID of a journey to retrieve. Returns all versions of the journey when specified.

parameter.name: mostRecentVersionOnly
parameter.description: Specifies whether to return the most recent version of each journey matching the filter criteria. Default is true.

parameter.name: nameOrDescription
parameter.description: A search string to apply to the request. Matches name and description of each journey.

parameter.name: specificApiVersionNumber
parameter.description: The version number of the workflowApiVersion value to retrieve. Default is 1.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: A journey status value to filter the results. Possible values: Deleted, Draft, Published, ScheduledToPublish, Stopped, Unpublished.

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter the results. Returns only journeys with the specified tag.

parameter.name: versionNumber
parameter.description: The version number of the journey to retrieve. Default is the currently published version or the latest version number meeting the criteria.
